get.description: Retrieve the status of a specific intent operation along with the status of each operation within the intent.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Unique identifier of the intent operation

parameters.name: full
parameters.description: Whether to include intent operation details

status.description: Overall status of the intent operation

fillTransactionHash.description: Transaction hash of the fill transaction

destinationChainId.description: Chain ID of the fill transaction

claimTimestamp.description: Timestamp when the claim was processed

claimTransactionHash.description: Transaction hash of the claim transaction

claims.description: Array of claims within the intent

error.description: Error message describing the server-side issue

get.description: Retrieves the token balances across all supported chains for a user's abstracted account

parameters.name: userAddress
parameters.description: Ethereum address of the user account

parameters.name: chainIds
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of chain IDs to filter by

parameters.name: tokens
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of chain:token pairs to filter by

parameters.name: filterEmpty
parameters.description: Whether to filter out tokens with zero balance

tokenDecimals.description: Number of decimal places for the token

locked.description: Total balance across all chains (as string to handle BigInt)

unlocked.description: Total balance across all chains (as string to handle BigInt)

chainId.description: Chain ID where the token balance exists

tokenAddress.description: Token contract address on this chain

locked.description: Token balance on this specific chain (as string to handle BigInt)

unlocked.description: Token balance on this specific chain (as string to handle BigInt)

tokenChainBalance.description: Array of token balances per chain

Multiple Tokens.summary: Portfolio with multiple tokens across chains
